title: Mission Education
text: More than 100 of teachers received training in academic methodologies, ensuring an engaging environment for the children.

title: Healthcare Camps
text: 100,835 people received healthcare services through 14 operational projects in 278 remote villages.

title: School Health Programme
text: More than 20,000 school going children benefitted from School Health Programme.

title: Woman Empowerment Programme
text: 0ver 60,000 women and girl children were benefitted and empowered through various interventions under the Woman Empowerment Programme.
